creator: Cadence Bank, N.A.
descriptionHtml:
Cadence Bank Mobile allows you to bank in the moment with one easy-to-use and secure suite called Fluent by Cadence. You can check your balances, make a deposit, pay a bill, instantly move money, and manage your budget.
Get started by registering for Cadence Bank’s online banking services, Fluent by Cadence, at www.fluentbycadence.com.

What’s new?
Simplified design
Remember your user ID
Reset your password

What’s included?

Mobile Banking
View your account balances, check images, details and history in one easy to use app. Make one-time or scheduled transfers of money between your Cadence accounts. See your average monthly balance, view recent deposits, and search for a specific transaction.

Improved User Management
Remember your user ID and avoid retyping it each time you load the app. Reset your password from the mobile app.

FlashDeposit
Make a photo of your check, not a trip to the bank to make deposits. Make your deposits securely on the go or after banking hours, directly into your eligible Cadence Bank checking or savings account.

Bill Pay*
Pay your bills on the go with Fluent. You can make a one-time payment, schedule a future payment, and set up recurring payments. Need to change or cancel a payment? You can do that right in the app.

TotalMoney*
Track your expenses and see your budget with our money management tool, TotalMoney. View all of your financial accounts in one place. Monitor budgets based on your actual spending history.

Security
For your protection, your account numbers, user ID, password or check images are not stored on your mobile device. Importantly, Fluent employs multiple layers of security to protect communications between the mobile device and the bank, to ensure the user is enrolled and to ensure that the mobile device is registered for use of this app. Industry-standard Secure Socket Layer (SSL) encryption is used as well as multi-factor authentication and session management.

*Please note that these services require registration online at www.fluentbycadence.com before the service can be used in the Cadence Bank mobile app.

Touch ID is a registered trademark of Apple Inc.
Popmoney is a registered trademark of Fiserv, Inc.

Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.

Minimum system requirements: Android OS 5 and higher are supported.

Cadence Bank, N.A. Member FDIC. Equal Opportunity Lender.
descriptionShort: Bank in the moment to check balances, make a deposit, pay a bill, or move money.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Bug Fixes and support for linking to the Cadence More app.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: This version brings bug fixes and performance improvements.

title: Cadence Bank Mobile

creator: Cadence Bank, N.A.
descriptionHtml:
With the Cadence Bank Mobile app managing your personal or company’s on-the-go banking has never been more convenient, from depositing checks and reviewing account balances to making payments and dispositioning positive pay exceptions. For personal online banking, enroll at cadencebank.com.

[+] Within the app, Cadence Online Banking (consumer) users can take advantage of:

• View your account balances, check images, details, history, average monthly balance, and recent deposits, and search for a specific transaction. Make one-time or scheduled transfers of money between your Cadence accounts.
• FlashDeposit: Take a photo of your check to make your deposits securely on-the-go or after banking hours.
• Bill Pay*: Pay your bills on-the-go. You can make a one-time payment, schedule a future payment, set up recurring payments, or change or cancel a payment.
• Zelle®*: Send or request money from friends and family. Zelle®* allows you to split a dinner bill with a friend, pay a babysitter, share the cost of a gift for family and more.
• Apply personalization to fit desired preferences.
• View alerts, such as when an account balance drops below a certain threshold.
• Open a new consumer account, dispute charges, send a secure message to a banker or client support team, and schedule an appointment with a banker.
• Get need-to-know information pushed through News & Alerts and easily access valuable FAQs in the Resource Center for learning and discovery.
• TotalMoney*: With our money management tool you can track your expenses, view all of your financial accounts in one place and monitor budgets based on your actual spending history.
• Connect with Cadence: Locate the branch or ATM closest to you.

*Please note that these services require registration online at www.cadencebank.com/online before the service can be used in the Cadence Bank Mobile app.

[+] As a commercial banking user, you are able to:
• Check account balances and make account transfers.
• Easily make commercial mobile deposits.
• Schedule, edit and approve your ACH and Wire transfer transactions.**
• Decision your Positive Pay exception items; manage your check issued or voided items and create or modify ACH Debit filters.**
• View and download bank account and account analysis statements.
• View action items and alerts in Today’s tab.
• Set your preferences by choosing your landing page; sort/hide your account list and pin up to six shortcuts to your Quick menu.

**Based on your established access.

[+] Popmoney is a registered trademark of Fiserv, Inc.
[+] Zelle is a registered trademark of Early Warning Systems
[+] Your mobile carrier's message and data rates may apply.
[+] Cadence Bank, N.A. Member FDIC. Equal Opportunity Lender.
[+] Minimum system requirements: Android 8 and higher are supported.
descriptionShort: Bank in the moment to check balances, make a deposit, pay a bill, or move money.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: The all-new Cadence Bank Mobile app delivers an all-new look and feel and a wealth of new features.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
The update includes fixes and improvements. We appreciate your feedback for the new app.
- Fixed issue where Tile and List mode for accounts wasn't saving between sessions
- Improvements on handling larger font settings
- Condensed account tiles in List mode to show more accounts
